title: Panel Real-Time Updates via EventBus
details:
v1.6.2.3 fix: Quick Tabs Manager panel now updates in real-time via EventBus listeners instead of 2-second polling.

Key changes:
1. PanelManager passes eventBus, liveStateManager, minimizedManager to PanelContentManager
2. PanelContentManager.setupStateListeners() subscribes to state:added, state:updated, state:deleted, state:hydrated events
3. updateContent() queries live state from StateManager instead of browser.storage.sync
4. Polling interval reduced from 2000ms to 10000ms as backup mechanism
5. Statistics display shows "X active, Y minimized" instead of static "Last sync" timestamp

EventBus events used:
- state:added - Quick Tab created
- state:updated - Quick Tab minimized/restored/position changed  
- state:deleted - Quick Tab closed
- state:hydrated - Cross-tab sync completed
